content: little sister s dress is a cute little dress - or vest if you like it is worked top-down and is totally seamless the set is made with eiter hifa superwash or with two strands of hifa alv held together **the pattern was updated on 9/14/09 make sure you have the updated version ** there is an english french and a norwegian version of the pattern if you choose to purchase the pattern for immediate download you will receive all three versions *disponible en français en cliquant sur free ravelry download *
